title: Youtube - Playlist of login screen musics - Missing Jhin Login scren music!

embed.description: Recently recognized as the most played video game in the world-67 million play every month-League of LegendsÂ® is a multiplayer online battle arena game (MOBA). Players choose a role from an expanding cast of powerful champions and join forces in strategic, fast-paced gameplay to take control of the enemy's end of the battlefield.

body:
I think the title say it all!

The login scren music of Jhin is awesomely creepy and I would love to listen it among that playlist. It would be awesome if you could add it to the playlist, thank you! :-)

replies.body:
Thanks for your kind comments, loved writing Jhin's music!

I've let the powers-that-be know about that, hopefully they find time to do this soon!

Cheers,

Ed the Conqueror

> Thanks for your kind comments, loved writing Jhin's music!
> 
> I've let the powers-that-be know about that, hopefully they find time to do this soon!
> 
> Cheers,
> 
> Ed the Conqueror

Hope you're doing well Ed. I actually made a thread about the Lunar Revel promotional page about two weeks ago in which I believe you commented. I'm aware that the background music for the promotional page is similar to the Lunar Revel login page, but I was still wondering if it's going to get released anyway? Just curious.

> [{quoted}](name=NinjaGuy69,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YgmeHoWL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-09T16:41:16.545+0000)
>
> Hope you're doing well Ed. I actually made a thread about the Lunar Revel promotional page about two weeks ago in which I believe you commented. I'm aware that the background music for the promotional page is similar to the Lunar Revel login page, but I was still wondering if it's going to get released anyway? Just curious.

Hey NinjaGuy69!

We won't be releasing the Lunar Revel music on YouTube, but it is available on our SoundCloud page!

[https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/lunar-revel-2016-a-traveler-arrives](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/lunar-revel-2016-a-traveler-arrives)

Thanks for listening!

Ed the Conqueror

> We won't be releasing the Lunar Revel music on YouTube, but it is available on our SoundCloud page!
> 
> [https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/lunar-revel-2016-a-traveler-arrives](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/lunar-revel-2016-a-traveler-arrives)
> 
> Thanks for listening!
> 
> Ed the Conqueror

Thanks for the helpful link Ed. It's always a pleasure listening to your awesome compositions. Looking forward to hearing your future works.
